name: Lucid
description: SQL ORM with a database query builder, Active record based models, support for migrations, and model factories for testing.

name: Auth
description: Driver-based authentication layer with support for sessions, API tokens, basic auth, and much more.

name: Bouncer
description: Bouncer provides low-level APIs to build custom authorization workflows like RBAC or ACL.

name: FlyDrive
description: FlyDrive provides a unified API to manage user-uploaded files on S3, GCS, and the local filesystem.

name: Limiter
description: Protect your API endpoints by implementing fine-grained rate limiting. Supports multiple backend stores.

name: Edge
description: A modern and batteries-included template engine for the ones who keep things simple.

name: Bentocache
description: Speed up your applications by storing slowly changing data in a multi-tier cache store.

name: VineJS
description: A superfast and type-safe validation library for Node.js. VineJS comes with 50+ validation rules and 12+ schema types.

name: Ally
description: Add support for Social login to your apps. Ally ships Twitter, GitHub, Google, LinkedIn, and many more drivers.

name: I18n
description: Create multi-lingual web apps. We provide APIs for localization, formatting values, and managing translations.

name: Health checks
description: Monitor database connectivity, redis memory size, and your application health using a single package.

name: Mailer
description: Send emails from your application using a multi-driver mailer. Supports SMTP, SES, Mailgun, Resend and much more.

name: Transmit
description: Send real-time updates by leveraging the power of Server Sent Events (SSE).

name: Lock
description: Synchronize the access to a shared resource to prevents several processes, or concurrent code, from executing a section of code at the same time.

name: Vite
description: Bundle the frontend assets of your applications using Vite.

name: Inertia
description: Make your frontend and backend work together in perfect harmony.

name: Tuyau
description: An end-to-end type-safe client for interacting with your AdonisJS APIs.
